casebody.data:
EDISON FIXTURE COMPANY, INCORPORATED, PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. M. A. RUCCOLO, DEFENDANT-APPELLEE. Argued October 8, 1024 Decided February 5, 1925.

Before Justices Trench abb, Mintcjrn and Lloyd.

Eor the appellant, Herman B. J. Weclcstein. Eor the appellee, Thomas P. Gurley. Per Curiam.

The evidence is not set forth in the state of the case.

The judgment for the defendant will be presumed to have been justified by the proofs, and will be affirmed, with costs.
